creator: ThomasL.home@web.de
text:
I've translated more than 50%. But for some phrases I was unable to find a
suitable translation so i left them blank. Perhaps I'll try them again later (or
someone else does).

I hope I've well done that packaging and bug report.

Created attachment 21592
Package with translated property files (src/)

Translation done on 2008-02-21 (upload 2008-02-26).
creator: ThomasL.home@web.de
ThomasL.home@web.de
text:
The uploaded package contains the src/ structure with only *.property files.
This is because the archive was too large to upload. I hope someone will fix it.

If everything will fail, all files remain on my disk.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Thnks, applied to SVN in r632680.

By the way, the bz2 archive format is not as well supported as zip or gzip, so please use those instead in future. Also, for updated (rather than new) files, please provide difference patches rather than complete source files. Thanks.
